revised_title: A Survey of X-ray Astronomy with HEAO A-1: Discovering Thousands of X-ray Sources
tldr: The authors describe the performance and objectives of the A-1 instrument aboard the first NASA High Energy Astronomical Observatory (HEAO). The instrument, composed of seven modules of large-area proportional counters, aimed to map the entire sky for sources between 0.25-20 keV. The survey successfully detected around 1000 X-ray sources, contributing significantly to the field of X-ray astronomy.
